content.rendered:
When it comes to fighting for honor, the price doesn’t matter. Maciej Berbeka returns to one of the world’s most dangerous mountains, Broad Peak, to clear his reputation. Returning to Karakorum involves difficult decisions that will forever change his life and those close to him.

Director: Leszek Dawid

Writers: Lukasz Ludkowski. Maciej Rzaczynski. Leszek Dawid

Stars: Ireneusz Czop. Maja Ostaszewska. Piotr Glowacki
